previous.title: What are your top tips for leading an intersectional workplace? Answer by @ElizaVancort, author: A Woman's Guide to Claiming Space: Stand Tall. Raise Your Voice. Be Heard. https://t.co/9o1e3IVq77 https://t.co/EfYrMUMQ8Q

localize.full_text: インターセクショナルな職場をリードするためのトップヒントは何ですか？回答者：@ElizaVancort、著者。A Woman's Guide to Claiming Space: 背筋を伸ばす。あなたの声を上げてください。Be Heard. https://t.co/9o1e3IVq77 https://t.co/EfYrMUMQ8Q
您在领导跨部门工作场所方面有什么高招？回答者：@ElizaVancort，作者。一个女人主张空间的指南。站得高。提高你的声音。倾听。https://t.co/9o1e3IVq77 https://t.co/EfYrMUMQ8Q
您在領導跨部門工作場所方面有什麼高招？回答者：@ElizaVancort，作者。一個女人主張空間的指南。站得高。提高你的聲音。傾聽。https://t.co/9o1e3IVq77 https://t.co/EfYrMUMQ8Q

next.title: How can I objectively evaluate my business’s worth? Answer by Michelle Seiler Tucker, author of Exit Rich: The 6 P Method to Sell Your Business for Huge Profit. https://t.co/nsMJ9Cvn87 https://t.co/lYgVnOmwpy

localize.full_text: 自分のビジネスの価値を客観的に評価するにはどうしたらいいでしょうか？Exit Rich: The 6 P Method to Sell Your Business for Huge Profit』の著者、Michelle Seiler Tucker氏による回答です。https://t.co/nsMJ9Cvn87 https://t.co/lYgVnOmwpy
我怎样才能客观地评估我的企业的价值？答案：Michelle Seiler Tucker，《Exit Rich: The 6 P Method to Sell Your Business for Huge Profit》的作者。https://t.co/nsMJ9Cvn87 https://t.co/lYgVnOmwpy
我怎樣才能客觀地評估我的企業的價值？答案：Michelle Seiler Tucker，《Exit Rich: The 6 P Method to Sell Your Business for Huge Profit》的作者。https://t.co/nsMJ9Cvn87 https://t.co/lYgVnOmwpy
